text: Buly y troye, yakym daly vidstrochku [dlya kayattya]. Stala vuzʹkoyu dlya nykh shyroka zemlya, y stysnulysya dushi yikhni. Vony vyrishyly, shcho nemaye zakhystu vid Allaha, krim yak u Nʹoho Samoho. Potim Vin prostyv yikh, shchob rozkayalysya vony. Voistynu, Allah — Pryymayuchyy kayattya, Myloserdnyy
